text:
School has extremely strong emphasis on grades and PSLE. Therefore by sending your kids here, it would value add them to do well in PSLE.

Values like hard work, discipline and perseverance is strongly reinforced in the curriculum, with a robust desire to push students to study, especially for P5 and P6 classes. This would be even more apparent if you are in the top 2 classes. Teachers allocated to graduating batches would also be of those who are immune to and have immense expertise in guiding graduating batches of students. All these academic values instilled in me from P5 to P6 at a super young age has helped me gone far in secondary school, where students will later face another set of challenges.

Apart from that, the school provides a lot of opportunity to help students grow holistically. However then again, your child must be expected to speak up and talk to teachers privately if he/she wants to find out more about events/leadership roles/ccas to grow holistically :).

All in all an extremely ideal school to put your child in if you strongly believe in academic excellence.

Graduated last year. Really good school and good teachers especially Mr Edward Tong , Mdm Maisarah and  Mr Neo . The teaching environment is fun , The school activities are also fun and the school food is nice. If you get Mr Edward Tong, he is very very very nice and funny . He is a fatherly figure as well . He makes learning math or science fun and exciting. ( best math teacher ever!)

I graduated from this sch last yr! And most of the teachers there are super friendly and kind! Ms Shah and Mr Tong are literally the best teachers ever!!! Ms shah is kind, caring and humorous! Mr tong is a fatherly figure and super funny!

i graduated from this school last year. Overall,i like all the teachers that taught me in p6. Especially, Mr Chew keng kok,Mr chu boon hong, Mr izzat and Ms liang. Im very grateful towards them. I'll definitely recommend this school!

I am a graduate of Ngee Ann. I love the teachers, they are so thoughtful and kind also supportive. When I had my ups and downs teachers would give Pep talksâ€¦amazing!
I miss Ngee Ann

-Choo Kady 2023
